toward an understand of data structur thi paper present anotat and formal for describ the semant of data structurthi is base on direct graph with name edg andtransform on these graph in addit an implement facil isdescrib which could be part of a program languag whichallow a programm who ha express the semant of analgorithm in term of the graph to then specifi theimplement of some of hi data structur in order togain effici cacm octob 1971 earlei j data structur graphimplement semant formal program languag 4 22 4 9 524 ca711001 jb februari 2 1978 1 35 pm 10244 2155 1051 4 2155 1051 4 2155 1102 42155 1132 4 2155 1390 4 2155 1486 4 21551549 4 2155 1552 4 2155 1665 4 2155 17064 2155 1826 4 2155 1860 4 2155 1860 42155 1878 4 2155 1957 4 2155 378 4 21552060 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2155 4 2155 21554 2155 2155 4 2155 2155 4 2155 2162 42155 2168 4 2155 2294 4 2155 2406 4 21552558 4 2155 2710 4 2155 2715 4 2155 27164 2155 2717 4 2155 2718 4 2155 2719 42155 2723 4 2155 2765 4 2155 2817 4 21552838 4 2155 2842 4 2155 2842 4 2155 28554 2155 2879 4 2155 2888 4 2155 2901 42155 2957 4 2155 2959 4 2155 2965 4 21553077 4 2155 3077 4 2155 3080 4 2155 30874 2155 3106 4 2155 3150 4 2155 3154 42155 627 4 2155 106 4 2155 210 5 21551389 5 2155 378 5 2155 2046 5 2155 20605 2155 2155 5 2155 2155 5 2155 2155 52155 2252 5 2155 2594 5 2155 1358 6 21551496 6 2155 1771 6 2155 2155 6 2155 21556 2155 2204 6 2155 3184 6 2155 3186 62155
